Java Switch Flow Control Only

Descripción

Modern switch used only for control flow (no return value)


File Template: ❌


Prefix

switch:flow


Scopes

java


Snippet de código

switch (${1:value}) {
	case ${2:A} -> ${3:doSomething()};
	case ${4:B} -> ${5:doSomethingElse()};
	default -> ${6:doDefault()};
}
